FreeRTOS mbed TLS Example: DTLS Server¶

Overview¶

This example takes reference from mbedtls dtls_server to test dtls client functionality.

Detailed Description¶

  • Extra Required Tools

  • Extra Required Peripherals

    • Digilent PMOD WIFI(MRF24WG0MA)

Note

EMSDP has board WiFi module, no need to use PMOD WiFI.

Note

The memory footprint of this example is larger then the default configuration of IoT Development Kit. Without optimization ,this example doesnot support IoT Development Kit

Buidling and Running¶

  1. Before building this example, it’s required to get the mbedtls code and apply specific patch through the apply_embarc_patch.sh by the following commands

cd <embarc_root>/middleware/mbedtls
sh apply_embarc_patch.sh

  1. When initialization finished and network connected, run main in ntshell, it will try to do dtls communication.

  2. In pc node or mbedtls dtls_client node, run the client application to connect to the server node.
